channel.title: Npc stuff
channel.description:
ok i have tried it on my own but i cant figure out how to make npcs tradeable and i mean like when u click like talk to or trade and this is what i wana no. how do u make it so a screen pops and u can buy stuff and how do u add items in the screen. also i need help with objects like how to spawn
thanks for all help
dArKsTaR447

item.title: Npc stuff
item.dc:creator: @digzey digzey
item.description:
@digzey wrote:

omg… lol… easy just basicly add another shop to client.java and shops.cfg look up a tut in tuts or rune-server tuts it’s all there lol…
